/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, lined with trees and buildings, stretches out into the distance, creating a sense of depth and scale. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise up against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. A few clouds are scattered across the sky, adding to the overall brightness of the scene. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire landscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and the blue of the sky contrasting with the gray and white of the buildings. The perspective of the image gives a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle, looking down upon it all.
